name: twinkly
content:
twinkly adjective
(THING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe something that shines in an attractive way: Stand out at the party in this pretty twinkly top! twinkly eyes

twinkly adjective
(PERSON)
UK used to describe someone who is friendly and who smiles a lot: a twinkly old lady
